trans-unit.source: Most of WP is loaded at this stage, and the user is authenticated. WP continues to load on the ‘init’ hook that follows (e.g. widgets), and many plugins instantiate themselves on it for all sorts of reasons (e.g. they need a user, a taxonomy, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段已加载大多数WP，并且已对用户进行身份验证。WP继续加载紧随其后的“ init”钩子（例如，小部件），并且许多插件出于各种原因（例如，他们需要用户，分类法等）在其上实例化自己。

trans-unit.source: Most of the $userdata array fields have filters associated with the values. Exceptions are ‘ID’, ‘rich_editing’, ‘syntax_highlighting’, ‘comment_shortcuts’, ‘admin_color’, ‘use_ssl’, ‘user_registered’, ‘user_activation_key’, ‘spam’, and ‘role’. The filters have the prefix ‘pre_user_’ followed by the field name. An example using ‘description’ would have the filter called ‘pre_user_description’ that can be hooked into.
trans-unit.target: $userdata 数组的大多数字段都具有与值关联的过滤器。 “ ID”，“ rich_editing”，“ syntax_highlighting”，“ comment_shortcuts”，“ admin_color”，“ use_ssl”，“ user_registered”，“ user_activation_key”，“ spam”和“ role”为例外。过滤器的前缀为“ pre_user_”，后跟字段名称。一个使用'description'的示例将具有一个名为'pre_user_description'的过滤器，该过滤器可以挂接到其中。

trans-unit.source: Most of the $userdata array fields have filters associated with the values. The filters have the prefix ‘pre_user_’ followed by the field name. An example using ‘description’ would have the filter called, ‘pre_user_description’ that can be hooked into.

trans-unit.source: Most of the time you can find the information you want without actually dealing with the class internals and global variables. There are a whole bunch of functions that you can call from anywhere that will enable you to get the information you need.

trans-unit.source: Most strings and form fields may be controlled through the $args array passed into the function, while you may also choose to use the ‘comment_form_default_fields’ filter to modify the array of default fields if you’d just like to add a new one or remove a single field. All fields are also individually passed through a filter of the ‘comment_form_field_$name’ where $name is the key used in the array of fields.
trans-unit.target: 大多数字符串和表单字段都可以通过传递给函数的$ args数组进行控制，而如果您想添加或删除新字段，也可以选择使用'comment_form_default_fields'过滤器来修改默认字段的数组一个字段。所有字段也分别通过'comment_form_field_ $ name'的过滤器传递，其中$ name是字段数组中使用的键。

trans-unit.source: Most strings and form fields may be controlled through the $args array passed into the function, while you may also choose to use the ‘comment_form_default_fields’ filter to modify the array of default fields if you’d just like to add a new one or remove a single field. All fields are also individually passed through a filter of the ‘comment_form_field_$name’ where $name is the key used in the array of fields.

trans-unit.source: Multiple users can collaborate on a single changeset, where one user may have the unfiltered_html capability but another may not. A user with unfiltered_html may add a script tag to some field which needs to be kept intact even when another user updates the changeset to modify another field when they do not have unfiltered_html.
trans-unit.target: 多个用户可以在一个变化集上合作,其中一个用户可能有unfiltered_html功能,但另一个用户可能没有。一个拥有 unfiltered_html 的用户可能会在某个字段上添加一个脚本标签,即使另一个没有 unfiltered_html 的用户更新更改集修改另一个字段时,这个标签也需要保持不变。

trans-unit.source: MySQL operator used for comparing the $key. Accepts '=', '!=' 'LIKE', 'NOT LIKE', 'IN', 'NOT IN', 'REGEXP', 'NOT REGEXP', 'RLIKE', 'EXISTS' (alias of '=') or 'NOT EXISTS' (alias of '!='). Default is 'IN' when $key is an array, '=' otherwise.

trans-unit.source: MySQL operator used for comparing the $value. Accepts '=', '!=', '>', '>=', '<', '<=', 'LIKE', 'NOT LIKE', 'IN', 'NOT IN', 'BETWEEN', 'NOT BETWEEN', 'REGEXP', 'NOT REGEXP', 'RLIKE', 'EXISTS' or 'NOT EXISTS'. Default is 'IN' when $value is an array, '=' otherwise.

trans-unit.source: NB: this won’t work for websites behind some load balancers, especially Network Solutions hosted websites. To body up a fix, save this gist into the plugins folder and enable it. For details, read WordPress is_ssl() doesn’t work behind some load balancers.

trans-unit.source: NB: transients that never expire are autoloaded, whereas transients with an expiration time are not autoloaded. Consider this when adding transients that may not be needed on every page, and thus do not need to be autoloaded, impacting page performance.
trans-unit.target: 注意:永远不会过期的瞬时元素会被自动加载,而有过期时间的瞬时元素不会被自动加载。在添加可能不是每个页面都需要的瞬时元素时要考虑这一点,因此不需要自动加载,否则会影响页面性能。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Once initialized the TinyMCE editor cannot be safely moved in the DOM. For that reason running wp_editor() inside of a meta box is not a good idea unless only Quicktags is used. On the post edit screen several actions can be used to include additional editors containing TinyMCE: ‘edit_page_form’, ‘edit_form_advanced’ and ‘dbx_post_sidebar’. See https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/19173 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：初始化后，TinyMCE编辑器无法安全地在DOM中移动。因此，除非仅使用Quicktags，否则在meta框内运行wp_editor（）并不是一个好主意。在后期编辑屏幕上，可以使用几个操作来包含包含TinyMCE的其他编辑器：“ edit_page_form”，“ edit_form_advanced”和“ dbx_post_sidebar”。有关更多信息，请参见https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/19173。

trans-unit.source: Normally, without any enhancements, the children would apply to pages. In the context of the inner workings of WordPress, pages, posts, and attachments share the same table, so therefore the functionality could apply to any one of them. It is then noted that while this function does not work on posts, it does not mean that it won’t work on posts. It is recommended that you know what context you wish to retrieve the children of.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果没有任何增强，则子级将应用于页面。在WordPress的内部工作环境中，页面，帖子和附件共享同一张表，因此该功能可以应用于其中的任何一个。然后请注意，尽管此功能不适用于帖子，但这并不意味着它不适用于帖子。建议您知道要检索其子级的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a strtotime()-compatible string with just a date was passed in the before parameter, this will be converted to 00:00:00 on that date. In this case, even if inclusive was set to true, the date would not be included in the query. If you want a before date to be inclusive, include the time as well, such as 'before' => '2013-02-28 23:59:59', or use the array format, which is adjusted automatically if inclusive is set.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 before 参数before中传递了只有日期的 strtotime() 兼容字符串，则该字符串将在该日期转换为00:00:00。在这种情况下，即使将 inclusive 设置为true，日期也不会包含在查询中。如果希望包含截止日期，请同时包含时间，例如 'before' => '2013-02-28 23:59:59' ，或使用数组格式，如果设置了 inclusive ，该格式会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: Note: This function will completely override the main query and isn’t intended for use by plugins or themes. Its overly-simplistic approach to modifying the main query can be problematic and should be avoided wherever possible. In most cases, there are better, more performant options for modifying the main query such as via the ‘pre_get_posts’ action within WP_Query.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此函数将完全覆盖主查询，并且不适合插件或主题使用。它用于修改主查询的过于简单的方法可能会出现问题，应尽可能避免使用。在大多数情况下，还有更好的，调整主查询，如通过更好的性能选项“pre_get_posts”内采取行动WP_Query。

trans-unit.source: Note: This hook is best to use to set up and execute code that doesn’t get echoed to the browser until later in the page load. Anything you echo will show up before any of the markup is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：最好使用此钩子来设置和执行直到页面加载后期才回显到浏览器的代码。您显示的任何回声都会在显示任何标记之前显示。

trans-unit.source: Note: This hook is best to use to set up and execute code that doesn’t get echoed to the browser until later in the page load. Anything you echo will show up before any of the markups is displayed.

trans-unit.source: Note: This implements ArrayAccess, and acts as an array of parameters when used in that manner. It does not use ArrayObject (as we cannot rely on SPL), so be aware it may have non-array behaviour in some cases.

trans-unit.source: Note: This should only be used in WP_REST_Server::serve_request(), as it cannot handle WP_Error internally. All callbacks and other internal methods should instead return a WP_Error with the data set to an array that includes a ‘status’ key, with the value being the HTTP status to send.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这只能在WP_REST_Server :: serve_request（）中使用，因为它不能在内部处理WP_Error。相反，所有回调和其他内部方法都应将WP_Error及其数据集返回到包含“状态”键的数组，该值是要发送的HTTP状态。

trans-unit.source: Note: Transients only get deleted when a request is made. So, until someone visits your page and calls up the Transient, it will stay in the DB. In short: It’s not a real persistent cache and not equal to stuff running on cron jobs.

trans-unit.target: 注意：当使用“某些字符串”显示为插件创建的菜单页面的子菜单时，该项目将成为第一个子菜单项，并替换顶级链接的位置。如果不希望这样做，则创建菜单页面的插件需要将admin_menu的add_action优先级设置为9或更低。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using features provided by ArrayAccess, be aware that WordPress deliberately does not distinguish between arguments of the same name for different request methods. For instance, in a request with GET id=1 and POST id=2, $request['id'] will equal 2 (POST) not 1 (GET). For more precision between request methods, use WP_REST_Request::get_body_params(), WP_REST_Request::get_url_params(), etc.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用ArrayAccess提供的功能时，请注意WordPress不会针对不同的请求方法故意区分相同名称的参数。例如，在具有 GET id=1 和 POST id=2 的 $request['id'] ，$ request ['id']等于2（ POST ）而不是1（ GET ）。为了提高请求方法之间的精度，请使用WP_REST_Request :: get_body_params（），WP_REST_Request :: get_url_params（）等。

trans-unit.source: One way that this function could be used in a theme is to produce a very light version of the site that does not have the large payload of the desktop site. Note that both the desktop and the mobile versions of the page will still need to be responsive, as an older portrait phone will have a significantly different width than a modern iPad in landscape. wp_is_mobile() will be true for both. Similarly a desktop browser window may not be displayed at full width. Essentially this approach may double the amount of work you will need to put into the theme. Yet for a tightly optimized theme or a unique mobile experience, it may be essential. It also means that a proper theme may have at least three different responsive design specs: Desktop, Mobile and AMP.
trans-unit.target: 可以在主题中使用此功能的一种方法是生成站点的非常轻便的版本，该版本不具有桌面站点的较大负载。请注意，页面的桌面版本和移动版本都仍需要响应，因为较早的人像手机的宽度与横向使用的现代iPad的宽度明显不同。wp_is_mobile（）对于这两者都是正确的。同样，桌面浏览器窗口可能无法全角显示。从本质上讲，这种方法可能会使您需要投入该主题的工作量增加一倍。但是对于严格优化的主题或独特的移动体验，这可能是必不可少的。这也意味着适当的主题可能至少具有三个不同的响应式设计规范：台式机，移动和AMP。

trans-unit.source: PHP 5.4.7 expanded parse_url()’s ability to handle non-absolute url’s, including schemeless and relative url’s with :// in the path. This function works around those limitations providing a standard output on PHP 5.2~5.4+.
trans-unit.target: PHP 5.4.7扩展了parse_url（）处理非绝对URL的能力，包括无路径和相对URL的路径中带有：//的URL。此功能可解决这些限制，并在PHP 5.2〜5.4 +上提供标准输出。

trans-unit.source: PHP date format to use for the listed pages. Relies on the 'show_date' parameter. Default is the value of 'date_format' option.
trans-unit.target: 在列出的页面中使用PHP日期格式。依赖于'show_date'参数。默认为'date_format'选项的值。

trans-unit.source: PHP has issues with Windows ACL’s for determine if a directory is writable or not, this works around them by checking the ability to open files rather than relying upon PHP to interprate the OS ACL.
trans-unit.target: PHP在Windows ACL的问题上无法确定目录是否可写，这可以通过检查打开文件的能力而不是依靠PHP来插入OS ACL来解决。

trans-unit.source: PHP may halt if you attempt to print an error result (
trans-unit.target: 如果你试图打印一个错误结果,PHP可能会停止(

trans-unit.source: PHP variable.
trans-unit.target: PHP变量。

trans-unit.source: PHP version number.
trans-unit.target: PHP版本号。

trans-unit.source: PHP’s SSL verifications only verify that it’s a valid Certificate, it doesn’t verify if the certificate is valid for the hostname which was requested. This function verifies the requested hostname against certificate’s subjectAltName field, if that is empty, or contains no DNS entries, a fallback to the Common Name field is used.
trans-unit.target: PHP的SSL验证仅验证它是有效的证书，而不验证该证书对于所请求的主机名是否有效。此函数根据证书的subjectAltName字段验证请求的主机名，如果该字段为空或不包含DNS条目，则使用回退到Common Name字段的方式。

trans-unit.source: Pagination Note: Use get_query_var('page'); if you want your query to work in a page template that you’ve set as your static front page. The query variable ‘page’ also holds the pagenumber for a single paginated Post or Page that includes the <!--nextpage--> quicktag in the post content.
trans-unit.target: 分页注意：请使用 get_query_var('page'); 如果您要查询在设置为静态首页的页面模板中工作。查询变量“页面”还保存单个分页的帖子或页面的页码，该页面或页面在帖子内容中包含 <!--nextpage--> quicktag。

trans-unit.source: Parameter $args is the desired capability type (e.g. ‘post’). Set [‘capability_type’] to an array to allow for alternative plurals when using this argument as a base to construct the capabilities, e.g. array(‘story’, ‘stories’). Set [‘map_meta_cap’] to true to obtain those capabilities as well.
trans-unit.target: 参数$ args是所需的功能类型（例如，“ post”）。将['capability_type']设置为一个数组，以使用此参数作为构造功能的基础时，可以使用其他复数形式，例如array（'story'，'stories'）。也将['map_meta_cap']设置为true即可获得这些功能。

trans-unit.source: Parameter $node takes an array of arguments:
trans-unit.target: 参数$node接受一个参数数组。

trans-unit.source: Parameter $args is an array of key -> value arguments to match against the taxonomies. Only taxonomies having attributes that match all arguments are returned.
trans-unit.target: 参数 $args 是键->值参数数组，用于与分类法进行匹配。仅返回具有与所有参数匹配的属性的分类法。

trans-unit.source: Parameter $file is the location of the file on the server. Use absolute path and not the URI of the file. The file MUST be in the uploads directory. See wp_upload_dir().
trans-unit.target: 参数 $file 是文件在服务器上的位置。使用绝对路径而不是文件的URI。该文件必须位于上载目录中。参见wp_upload_dir（）。

trans-unit.source: Parameter $users is An array of IDs of users to delete. Note that this parameter is currently not used by the function.
trans-unit.target: 参数 $users 是要删除的用户ID的数组。请注意，该函数当前未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Part of the Settings API. Use this in a settings page callback function to output all the sections and fields that were added to that $page with add_settings_section() and add_settings_field()
trans-unit.target: 设置API的一部分。在设置页面回调函数中使用此函数，以输出通过add_settings_section（）和add_settings_field（）添加到该$ page的所有节和字段。

trans-unit.source: Part of the Settings API. Use this in a settings page to output a specific section. Should normally be called by do_settings_sections() rather than directly.
trans-unit.target: 设置API的一部分。在设置页面中使用此选项可输出特定部分。通常应由do_settings_sections（）而不是直接调用。

trans-unit.source: Part of the Settings API. Use this to define a settings field that will show as part of a settings section inside a settings page. The fields are shown using do_settings_fields() in do_settings-sections()
trans-unit.target: 设置API的一部分。使用它来定义一个设置字段，该字段将显示为设置页面内设置部分的一部分。在do_settings-sections（）中使用do_settings_fields（）显示字段。

trans-unit.source: Part of the Settings API. Use this to define new settings sections for an admin page. Show settings sections in your admin page callback function with do_settings_sections(). Add settings fields to your section with add_settings_field().
trans-unit.target: 设置API的一部分。使用它来定义管理页面的新设置部分。使用do_settings_sections（）在管理页面回调函数中显示设置部分。使用add_settings_field（）将设置字段添加到您的部分。

trans-unit.source: Part of the Settings API. Use this to show messages to users about settings validation problems, missing settings or anything else.
trans-unit.target: 设置API的一部分。使用它来向用户显示有关设置验证问题、丢失设置或其他任何信息。

trans-unit.source: Passing a falsey value to the filter will effectively short-circuit loading the authentication check.
trans-unit.target: 向过滤器传递一个falsey值将有效地使加载的验证检查短路。

trans-unit.source: Passing a falsey value to the filter will effectively short-circuit the Widgets library from loading.
trans-unit.target: 传递一个falsey值给过滤器,将有效地短路Widgets库的加载。

trans-unit.source: Passing a non-array to the filter will effectively short-circuit preparing the upload bits, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 将一个非数组传递给过滤器将有效地短路准备上传位,而返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Passing a non-empty array will result in wp_prepare_themes_for_js() returning early with that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 传递非空数组将导致wp_prepare_themes_for_js（）较早返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Passing a non-empty value to the filter will short-circuit generation of the default playlist output, returning the passed value instead.
trans-unit.target: 传递一个非空值给过滤器,将使默认播放列表输出的生成短路,而返回传递的值。

trans-unit.source: Passing a non-empty value will short-circuit wp_get_document_title(), returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 传递非空值将使wp_get_document_title（）短路，而返回该值。
